Japan’s auto circles are showing great interest in constructing
plants overseas, according to the latest Economic Journal—

The five day Asian Editors Conference of the International
Press Institute closes in Tokyo.
Tokyo, of late has been the site of many international
conferences, but this is the first time for newspapernon
from all over Asia to assemble here. Because of growing
concern throughout Asia for the maintenance of a free press
the Tokyo Conference was dedicated to "increase mutual
understanding in order to contribute to world peace."
As a result of this first Asian conference, good relations
among working members of the press have been strengthened;
and we have reason to believe the ASIAN STORY will now be
better told.
